## DRINKS LIKE YOU’VE  
​NEVER ​TASTED BEFORE!

Tired of going to a party or reception and drinking the same old cheap beer or
bad vodka and tonics? Hosting an event and need good ideas for real crowd
pleasing cocktails, locally made craft beer selections, and world class
bartenders? We have you covered!  
  
We are an Akron-based, family-operated company with a passion for quality and
service. Though making most of our mixers from scratch with natural
ingredients does take a little extra time and effort, we believe our customers
deserve the very best for their special event.​ Whether you book the Bar Car,
Shiplap Bars, or the Photo Booth, we guarantee you'll be a Happy Camper too!

|  
  
---|---  
  
* * *

|

## MATT MAROON  
OWNER/MIXOLOGIST​

Matt's been inventing cocktails for years. Prior to owning the Happy Camper,
he worked at South Point Tavern in Akron, Ohio. He won the 2015 United States
Bartender's Guild Cocktail Contest with his Rittman Mule.  During the off-
season, he also consults for craft cocktail bars, designing draft cocktails
for bars all over the world, and runs a cocktail blog where he explores new
methods of cocktail production.  
  
---|---  
  
* * *

## MULTIPLE OPTIONS TO SUIT YOUR NEEDS

Though we are famous for our 1972 Airstream Bar Car, we do have other options
to choose from to fit your budget ​and spacial requirements. We also provide
experienced bartenders to make sure your service is fast and consistent
throughout your event. For a quote on which of our services fit your needs
click the button below.

Get A Quote

## WORLD CLASS COCKTAILS

## **MOSCOW MULES**

Our most popular mixer, Maroon's Ginger Beer, comes with every one of our
expanded beverage packages. It's a product you can only get directly from us,
and it is always a crowd-pleaser.

|

## **INNOVATIVE DRINKS**

Ramos Gin Fizz from a whipping siphon. Carbonated Negroni. Barrel-aged
Manhattans. Just a list of a few things we can do that you won't see very many
places.

|

## ******DRAFT BEER**  
 ****

We have six tap handles to serve homemade mixers, signature cocktails, and
craft beer on draft. We have relationships with most local breweries and can
find almost any draft beer available in Ohio.  
  
---|---|---
